pages.title: Kamen Rider Another Para-DX
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Para-DX with Poppy (2018, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver#gamer_driver_anotherparadox)Gamer Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste III$(li)Strength IV
